SEARCH
Package dev.bjdelacruz.services

Interface Query

All Known Implementing Classes:
AzureSqlQuery, DynamoDbQuery
public interface Query
Classes that implement this interface are used for querying relational and NoSQL databases.

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Query
    createQuery(DatabaseType databaseType, ChamorroDictionaryEntry entry, boolean exactMatch)
    Creates a Query for the given database type using an optional list of arguments for the query.

  • Method Details

    • createQuery

      static Query createQuery(DatabaseType databaseType, ChamorroDictionaryEntry entry, boolean exactMatch)
      Creates a Query for the given database type using an optional list of arguments for the query.
      Parameters:
      databaseType - The type of the database.
      entry - Contains the values to filter on for the query.
      exactMatch - True to perform an exact match, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      A Query for the given database type.
